parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

functionDecorators.name: nominateNewOwner
functionDecorators.description: Nominate a new owner of this contract. Only the current owner may nominate a new owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFeePool
functionDecorators.description: set the FeePool contract as it is the only authority to be able to call appendAccountIssuanceRecord with the onlyFeePool modifer. Must be set by owner when FeePool logic is upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: setSelfDestructBeneficiary
functionDecorators.description: Set the beneficiary address of this contract. Only the contract owner may call this. The provided beneficiary must be non-null.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address to pay any eth contained in this contract to upon self-destruction.

functionDecorators.name: terminateSelfDestruct
functionDecorators.description: Terminate and reset the self-destruction timer. Only the contract owner may call this.

functionDecorators.name: importIssuerData
functionDecorators.description: Import issuer data from shadowsState.issuerData on FeePeriodClose() block #. Only callable by the contract owner, and only for 6 weeks after deployment.

parameterDecorators.name: periodToInsert
parameterDecorators.description: The Fee Period to insert the historical records into.

parameterDecorators.name: feePeriodCloseIndex
parameterDecorators.description: An accounts debtEntryIndex is valid when within the fee peroid, since the input ratio will be an average of the pervious periods it just needs to be > recentFeePeriods[periodToInsert].startingDebtIndex < recentFeePeriods[periodToInsert - 1].startingDebtIndex.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Accept the nomination to be owner.

functionDecorators.name: appendAccountIssuanceRecord
functionDecorators.description: Logs an accounts issuance data in the current fee period which is then stored historically. onlyFeePool to call me on shadows.issue() & shadows.burn() calls to store the locked DOWS per fee period so we know to allocate the correct proportions of fees and rewards per period accountIssuanceLedger[account][0] has the latest locked amount for the current period. This can be update as many time accountIssuanceLedger[account][1-2] has the last locked amount for a previous period they minted or burned.

parameterDecorators.name: debtRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Debt of this account as a percentage of the global debt.

parameterDecorators.name: debtEntryIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The index in the global debt ledger. shadows.shadowsState().issuanceData(account).

parameterDecorators.name: currentPeriodStartDebtIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The startingDebtIndex of the current fee period.

functionDecorators.name: selfDestruct
functionDecorators.description: If the self-destruction delay has elapsed, destroy this contract and remit any ether it owns to the beneficiary address. Only the contract owner may call this.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: Index in the array to retrieve. Upto FEE_PERIOD_LENGTH.

functionDecorators.name: initiateSelfDestruct
functionDecorators.description: Begin the self-destruction counter of this contract. Once the delay has elapsed, the contract may be self-destructed. Only the contract owner may call this.

functionDecorators.name: applicableIssuanceData
functionDecorators.description: Find the oldest debtEntryIndex for the corresponding closingDebtIndex.

parameterDecorators.name: closingDebtIndex
parameterDecorators.description: the last periods debt index on close.
